member.name: ILaunchTargetViewSizePreference.GetTargetViewSizePreference
member.summary: Retrieves the preferred view size of the application being launched.
member.param: Contains the address of a pointer to an for the target application.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ILaunchTargetViewSizePreference
member.summary: Provides a method for retrieving the preferred view size for a new application window.
